snippet.title: Why the LinkedIn (LNKD) Selloff Is Overkill
snippet.description:
Why the LinkedIn (LNKD) Selloff Is Overkill
By Keris Alison Lahiff 10:37 AM EST 02/07/14
Shortly after posting 2014 guidance below analysts' expectations, LinkedIn (LNKD) tumbles as much as 10%. But is the selloff overdone?
http://www.thestreet.com/story/12317569/1/why-the-linkedin-lnkd-selloff-is-overkill.html

snippet.title: LinkedIn's $120 Million Bright Deal Targets Digitally Mapped Global Economy
snippet.description:
